mapper.sql: object_id AS "objectId" , use_type AS "useType" , data_type AS "dataType" , object_code AS "objectCode" , object_name AS "objectName" , object_comment AS "objectComment" , object_display_name AS "objectDisplayName" , object_pattern AS "objectPattern" , object_pattern_comment AS "objectPatternComment" , regex AS "regex" , object_extra_validation AS "objectExtraValidation" , char_max_length AS "charMaxLength" , char_min_length AS "charMinLength" , is_only_ascii AS "isOnlyAscii" , max_value AS "maxValue" , min_value AS "minValue" , datetime_precision AS "datetimePrecision" , numeric_precision AS "numericPrecision" , numeric_scale AS "numericScale" , is_enum AS "isEnum" , enum_values AS "enumValues" , system_code AS "systemCode" , version AS "version" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: object_id = #{objectId}, use_type = #{useType}, data_type = #{dataType}, object_code = #{objectCode}, object_name = #{objectName}, object_comment = #{objectComment}, object_display_name = #{objectDisplayName}, object_pattern = #{objectPattern}, object_pattern_comment = #{objectPatternComment}, regex = #{regex}, object_extra_validation = #{objectExtraValidation}, char_max_length = #{charMaxLength}, char_min_length = #{charMinLength}, is_only_ascii = #{isOnlyAscii}, max_value = #{maxValue}, min_value = #{minValue}, datetime_precision = #{datetimePrecision}, numeric_precision = #{numericPrecision}, numeric_scale = #{numericScale}, is_enum = #{isEnum}, enum_values = #{enumValues}, system_code = #{systemCode}, version = #{version}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dic_word ( object_id, use_type, data_type, object_code, object_name, object_comment, object_display_name, object_pattern, object_pattern_comment, regex, object_extra_validation, char_max_length, char_min_length, is_only_ascii, max_value, min_value, datetime_precision, numeric_precision, numeric_scale, is_enum, enum_values, system_code, version, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{objectId}, #{useType}, #{dataType}, #{objectCode}, #{objectName}, #{objectComment}, #{objectDisplayName}, #{objectPattern}, #{objectPatternComment}, #{regex}, #{objectExtraValidation}, #{charMaxLength}, #{charMinLength}, #{isOnlyAscii}, #{maxValue}, #{minValue}, #{datetimePrecision}, #{numericPrecision}, #{numericScale}, #{isEnum}, #{enumValues}, #{systemCode}, #{version}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
